trait.name: Burning Tangle
text: The ground within 10 feet of the thorned sulfurlord is difficult terrain.

trait.name: Hell Core
text: At the start of each of the thorned sulfurlord's turns, each creature within 10 feet of the sulfurlord takes 7 (2d6) fire damage. If the thorned sulfurlord takes cold damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Like Calls To Like
text: The thorned sulfurlord knows if a creature within 100 feet of it is evil-aligned or not.

trait.name: Root (3/Day)
text: As a bonus action, the thorned sulfurlord sends its roots deep into the ground. For 1 minute, the sulfurlord's speed is halved, it is immune to effects that would move it, and it can't be knocked prone.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The thorned sulfurlord makes two sulfur slam attacks or two fiery spike attacks.

action.name: Sulfur Slam
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 14 (2d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage plus 9 (2d8) fire damage. The target must succeed on a DC 17 Constitution saving throw or be blinded until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Fiery Spike
text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. 12 (3d6 + 2) piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) fire damage.

action.name: The World Shall Know Fire (Recharge 5-6)
text: The thorned sulfurlord targets a creature that has taken fire damage from it within the last minute and causes a burst of fire to expand out from that creature in a 30-foot-radius. Each creature in the area, including the target, must make a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw, taking 35 (10d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The fire ignites flammable objects in the area that aren't being worn or carried.
